author: rjmholt
body:
Error message:

```
Expected an exception, with FullyQualifiedErrorId 'AssemblyTypeNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.AddTypeCommand' to be thrown, but the FullyQualifiedErrorId was 'OUTPUTTYPE_REQUIRES_ASSEMBLY,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.AddTypeCommand'. from /home/vsts_azpcontainer/PSPackage/download/Test/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Add-Type.Tests.ps1:255 char:11
+         { Add-Type -TypeDefinition "Hello" -OutputType $outputType }  ?
+           ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
```

Stack trace:

```
at <ScriptBlock>, /home/vsts_azpcontainer/PSPackage/download/Test/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Add-Type.Tests.ps1: line 255
255:         { Add-Type -TypeDefinition "Hello" -OutputType $outputType } | Should -Throw -ErrorId 'AssemblyTypeNotSupported,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.AddTypeCommand'
```
title: Add-Type -OutputType throws the wrong error on Debian 11
